title: BREAKING: $39+ O/W Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest!
text:
BREAKING: $39+ O/W Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest! BREAKING: $39+ O/W Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest! August 18, 2015 4:26pm   Tweet 
Southwest's latest sale offers travel dates as far off as spring 2016—the longest window we've seen among current major airfare sales. Pricing on the more than 1,100 nonstop routes starts at $39 one-way ($78 round-trip). Tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on August 20. 
For most routes, travel any day but Fridays and Sundays during September 1 - March 3. Blackout dates prohibit travel September 7; November 24, 25; November 28 - December 1; December 26-28; January 2, 3; February 11, 15, 1 ... more 
Southwest's latest sale offers travel dates as far off as spring 2016—the longest window we've seen among current major airfare sales. Pricing on the more than 1,100 nonstop routes starts at $39 one-way ($78 round-trip). Tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on August 20. 
For most routes, travel any day but Fridays and Sundays during September 1 - March 3. Blackout dates prohibit travel September 7; November 24, 25; November 28 - December 1; December 26-28; January 2, 3; February 11, 15, 16. San Juan travel is valid September 9 - December 10 and again January 19 - March 2 and only Mondays - Thursdays. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on Southwest 's sale page. Pros: Travel date availability is extensive. Cons:
